title: Pig Form
data:
***Version [0.28](/0.28 "0.28")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | You have been transformed into a pig. You move quickly but are less effective in melee.Any equipped weapons, armour and rings are melded, and you are unable to cast spells. The effectiveness of your melee attacks while in this form is based on experience level instead of on Unarmed Combat skill. |

**Pig Form** is a [bad form](/Bad_form "Bad form") that can be inflicted by various means: the [unique](/Unique "Unique") monster [Kirke](/Kirke "Kirke")'s [Porkalator](/Porkalator "Porkalator") spell, by being [polymorphed](/Polymorph "Polymorph") (whether through the spell, a [Killer Klown](/Killer_Klown "Killer Klown"), or with the [wand](/Wand_of_polymorph "Wand of polymorph")), or by drawing the Swine card via [Nemelex Xobeh](/Nemelex_Xobeh "Nemelex Xobeh")'s wrath. Becoming a [hog](/Hog "Hog") melds almost all equipment, suppresses [mutations](/Mutation "Mutation"), and prevents spellcasting. Even characters with significant training in [unarmed combat](/Unarmed_combat "Unarmed combat") will find themselves incapable of fighting competently. The one advantage given by Pig Form is an increase to your character's base speed and evasion, improving your odds of fleeing to safety.

## Pros

- [Fast](/Fast "Fast") 2 ([movement](/Movement "Movement") delay 0.7)
- Small size (good evasion)

## Cons

- Sets base [AC](/AC "AC") to 0
- All equipment is melded except for [amulets](/Amulet "Amulet")
- Can't cast spells
- [Unarmed Combat](/Unarmed_Combat "Unarmed Combat") base damage is reduced to `1 + UC/5`

| Pig Form                                                         |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [![Pig form.png](/images/1/10/Pig_form.png)](/File:Pig_form.png) |

## History

- Prior to [0.22](/0.22 "0.22"), you could not evoke [wands](/Wand "Wand") while in Pig Form.
- While Pig Form has been around as long as Kirke has, version [0.12](/0.12 "0.12") made it somewhat more common with the changes to the [Polymorph](/Polymorph "Polymorph") spell.

| [Bad Forms](/Bad_Form "Bad Form") | [Bat Form](/Bat_Form "Bat Form") • [Fungus Form](/Fungus_Form "Fungus Form") • [Pig Form]() • [Tree Form](/Tree_Form "Tree Form") • [Wisp Form](/Wisp_Form "Wisp Form")                                                                                                                                                                                                           |

html:
Pig Form

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.28: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
You have been transformed into a pig. You move quickly but are less effective in melee.

Any equipped weapons, armour and rings are melded, and you are unable to cast spells. The effectiveness of your melee attacks while in this form is based on experience level instead of on Unarmed Combat skill.

Pig Form is a bad form that can be inflicted by various means: the unique monster Kirke's Porkalator spell, by being polymorphed (whether through the spell, a Killer Klown, or with the wand), or by drawing the Swine card via Nemelex Xobeh's wrath. Becoming a hog melds almost all equipment, suppresses mutations, and prevents spellcasting. Even characters with significant training in unarmed combat will find themselves incapable of fighting competently. The one advantage given by Pig Form is an increase to your character's base speed and evasion, improving your odds of fleeing to safety.

Pros

  • Fast 2 (movement delay 0.7)
  • Small size (good evasion)

Cons

  • Sets base AC to 0
  • All equipment is melded except for amulets
  • Can't cast spells
  • Unarmed Combat base damage is reduced to 1 + UC/5
Pig Form

History

  • Prior to 0.22, you could not evoke wands while in Pig Form.
  • While Pig Form has been around as long as Kirke has, version 0.12 made it somewhat more common with the changes to the Polymorph spell.
Transformations
Talisman Beast Form • Flux Form • Blade Form • Maw Form • Serpent Form • Dragon Form • Statue Form • Death Form • Storm Form
Bad Forms Bat Form • Fungus Form • Pig Form • Tree Form • Wisp Form
Divine Shadow Form
